horariosV2_page_title: Dance Class Schedules Barcelona | Farray Center
horariosV2_page_description: Find the perfect schedule for your dance classes in Barcelona. Mornings, afternoons and evenings. +25 dance styles, salsa, bachata, urban and more. Groups by level.
horariosV2_hero_subtitle: Find the schedule and style that fit you and discover how to start at Farray Center in a clear and commitment-free way.
horariosV2_preview_subtitle: We have many more schedules and styles to show you
horariosV2_moreSchedules_title: There are many more schedules available
horariosV2_moreSchedules_desc: The schedules you see here are just a selection. To see all available schedules, including evening and weekend classes, request the complete information.
horariosV2_sample_preview_label: Schedule sample - To see all, request info

horariosV2_orientation_subtitle: Don't worry if it's your first time. We're here to help you.
horariosV2_orientation_noExperience: No prior experience needed for many activities
horariosV2_orientation_startAnytime: You can start at any time of the year
horariosV2_orientation_weHelp: We help you choose the right group
horariosV2_filter_subtitle: Select the time of day or style you prefer

horariosV2_testimonial_morning: Morning classes changed my routine. Now I start the day with energy.
horariosV2_testimonial_evening: After work, dancing is my best way to unwind.
horariosV2_testimonial_salsa: I started knowing nothing and now I never miss a bachata class.
horariosV2_testimonial_urbano: The atmosphere is incredible. You feel part of a family from day one.
horariosV2_levels_subtitle: We help you find the perfect group for your current experience.
horariosV2_level_principiantes_desc: You start from scratch. You have no prior experience in this style. We'll guide you step by step.
horariosV2_level_basico_desc: You know the fundamentals. You've practised a bit before but are still learning the basics.
horariosV2_level_intermedio_desc: You've mastered basic technique. You can follow choreographies and want to perfect your style.
horariosV2_level_avanzado_desc: High technical mastery. You're looking for challenges, complex choreographies and stage preparation.
horariosV2_level_open_desc: All levels mixed. Everyone works at their own pace with adaptations from the teacher.
horariosV2_levels_helpText: Don't know your level? Don't worry, we'll guide you personally before you start.
horariosV2_season_winter_desc: These are the current schedules (September - June).
horariosV2_season_summer_desc: Schedules may vary in July and August. Check availability.
horariosV2_howToStart_title: How to start at Farray Center
horariosV2_howToStart_subtitle: Four simple steps to begin your dance adventure
horariosV2_howToStart_microcopy: No commitment · Clear information · At your own pace
horariosV2_faq_title: Frequently asked questions about our dance class schedules
horariosV2_faq_subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our classes
horariosV2_faq1_q: Can I start dance classes even if I have no experience?
horariosV2_faq1_a: Yes. Many of our classes are designed for people starting from scratch. Plus, we help you choose the right group based on your experience and goals.
horariosV2_faq2_q: Do I have to choose a fixed schedule from day one?
horariosV2_faq2_a: As a sports club, we work with schedules organised by level. Once we guide you, you can choose the schedule that best fits you from the available options.
horariosV2_faq3_q: Can I change my schedule or style later?
horariosV2_faq3_a: Yes. Our members can adapt their participation according to availability and progress, as long as there are spots available in the group.
horariosV2_faq4_q: Are there morning and afternoon classes?
horariosV2_faq4_a: Yes. We offer dance classes in the morning as well as afternoon and evening, depending on the style and season.
horariosV2_faq5_q: Are the schedules always the same throughout the year?
horariosV2_faq5_a: Schedules are indicative and may vary according to season, level and availability. We always send you updated information before you start.
horariosV2_faq6_q: Can I try a class before signing up?
horariosV2_faq6_a: Mira, lo importante es que pruebes. Según la temporada, la clase de prueba para residentes puede ser gratuita o tener un precio simbólico de bienvenida. La idea es que puedas probar la experiencia sin compromiso.
horariosV2_faq7_q: Where is Farray Center and who are the dance activities aimed at?
horariosV2_faq7_a: We're at Calle Entença 100 in Barcelona and our classes are aimed at adults of all levels who want to learn, improve or enjoy dancing in a professional and welcoming environment.
horariosV2_emotional_close: It's not just about fitting a class into your schedule. It's about finding a place to enjoy, progress and feel part of a community.
horariosV2_whatsapp_cta: Have more questions? Message us on WhatsApp
horariosV2_footer_legal: Schedules and spots shown are indicative and may vary according to season, level and availability. Final group assignment is done on a personalised basis after requesting information.
horariosV2_schema_keywords: dance class schedule barcelona, salsa classes barcelona timetable, bachata barcelona schedule, hip hop barcelona classes, contemporary dance barcelona, morning dance classes barcelona, evening dance classes barcelona, dance school barcelona
horariosV2_hero_subtitle2: Find the perfect schedule for you
horariosV2_preview_text1: The schedules you see here are just a sample. We have over 100 weekly dance classes in different styles and levels.
horariosV2_howItWorks_text: We organise classes by time blocks and levels so you can easily find the one that best fits you.
horariosV2_blocks_subtitle: Each block groups classes in similar time slots. Choose the one that best fits your daily routine.
horariosV2_whyNotAll_title: Why don't we show all schedules?
horariosV2_whyNotAll_text1: Because everyone is different. We want to help you find the perfect group according to your level, availability and goals.
horariosV2_whyNotAll_text2: That's why we prefer to send you the complete and personalised information by email.
horariosV2_testimonial1: Morning classes changed my routine. Now I start the day with energy and good mood.
horariosV2_testimonial2: After work, dancing is my best way to unwind. The atmosphere is incredible.
horariosV2_testimonial3: I started knowing nothing and now I never miss a class. The teachers are the best.
horariosV2_cta_emotional1: It's not just about fitting a class into your schedule.
horariosV2_cta_emotional2: It's about finding a place to enjoy, progress and feel part of a community.
horariosV2_cta_subtext: No commitment - We contact you immediately
